lines.text: They kill to protect family?
In the end, it's all for the HUNTING GROUND.
[about the wolves]
They're shiftless. They might be gods!

It's not wolves, it's Wolfen. For 20,000 years Wilson- ten times your fucking Christian era- the 'skins and wolves, the great hunting nations, lived together, nature in balance. Then the slaughter came.
The smartest ones, they went underground into a new wilderness, YOUR CITIES. You have your technology but you lost. You lost your senses
In their world, there can be no lies, no crimes.
No need for detectives.
In their eyes, YOU ARE THE SAVAGE.
They kill...
The sick. The abandoned. Those who will not be missed.
More than that.
They kill to survive. They kill to protect.
Family?
Man kills for less. But in the end, it is all for the hunting ground.
You've seen them, haven't you? You don't have the eyes of the Hunter. You have the eyes of the dead.
I'm going to team you up with Dewey Wilson on this Christopher VanderVeer thing.
I didn't know he was back. I thought he retired, disabled, mental...?
He had a lot of family problems, he started to drink a little too much, police work... piled up on him. He's a good man, you'll like him.
Okay, fine.
[Eddie and Dewey are up on the top of a bridgeworks]
Shape shifting. We do it for kicks. Turn yourself into a different animal. One night a deer, next night a salmon...
Or a wolf?
Sure.
[Eddie unhooks Dewey's safety line]
Or an eagle.
[Dewey looks down, a long way... ]
C'mon Dewey, just flap your arms and jump, its easy. It's all in the head.
That would be murder. You wouldn't kill anyone else, would you?
That's what they pay you to find out...
Well I'll be God fuckin' damned.

[Ending voiceover]
In arrogance man knows nothing of what exists. There exists on this earth such as we dare not imagine; life as certain as our death, life that will prey on us as surely as we prey on this earth.
What are you two trying to pin on the big bad?
A murder case.
What? A hitman in a furcoat.
South Bronx and Wall Street! What's the connection?
They're both dead!
